posts.post_content:
I trying to raise a bit of cash for a few items I have my eyes on... all of these are graded SGC 10 (except Beaumont).  Price includes delivery; first come first serve:
1-2 cards: $18 each
3-6 cards: $17 each
7+ cards: $16 each

[URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers#100037&bgcolor=black&view=grid"]Front and back scans of all cards...[/URL]

The following cards are still available:
Red Ames (Portrait) - P150
Shad Barry - PB
SGC A - Ginger Beaumont - P150 - SGC A
Donie Bush - P350
Steve Evans - PB
Moose Grimshaw - PB
Buck Herzog (New York) - SC150-30
Tommy Leach (Bending Over) - PB
Glenn Liebhardt - P150
Peter O'Brien - P350
Phil Poland - P350

Hunky Shaw - P350
Frank Smith (F. Smith On Front) - SC150-30

Lucky Wright - P350
PM sent on Harry Gasper and Bob Spade :)

Ill Take Jack Barry 
What is paypal address. Thanks

I'm interested in thefollowing:

Crandall
Dunn
Doolin

With so many, will you take $15 each for a sizeable purchase?

PM or email me at [url]paulehawk3@gmail.com[/url]

Paul
Red Ames (Portrait), Johnny Bates, Glenn Liebhardt and Ginger Beaumont (this one is SGC - A); all are P150.
Thanks to everyone for your purchases!  I was able to pick up the card I wanted because of the sales!

[quote name="t206hound" post=852978]Thanks to everyone for your purchases!  I was able to pick up the card I wanted because of the sales![/QUOTE]

Congratulations on your purchase. What is the card?

[quote name="Reds Collector" post=853300]Congratulations on your purchase. What is the card?[/QUOTE]

I picked up the Cobb (miscut with name on top) that ended on Ebay on Sunday.

Cobb is a great pick up. I received the Gasper and Spade today. Thank you, they are great additions to my Cincinnati Reds team set.

Have a Merry Christmas!:)

Hi,

I see you have purchased the card you wanted. I'm just wondering if the rest are still for sale? If so, is the Jimmy Sheckard still available?

Thanks,
Tom

Thanks Tom!
twenty-four cards left...
